analyzed: antavā loko ti vā mālukyaputta diṭṭhiyā sati anantavā loko ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attha iva jāti atthi jarā atthi maraṇa santi soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā
yesā aham diṭṭhā iva dhamme nighātam paññapemi

original: ‘Taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīran’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṁ no.
analyzed: tam jīvam tam sarīranti mālukyaputta diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariya vāso abhavissāti evam no

original: ‘Aññaṁ jīvaṁ aññaṁ sarīran’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.
analyzed: aññam jīvam aññam sarīranti mālukyaputta diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariya vāso abhavissāti evam pi no

original: ‘Taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīran’ti vā, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘aññaṁ jīvaṁ aññaṁ sarīran’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti …pe…
analyzed: tam jīvam tam sarīranti vā mālukyaputta diṭṭhiyā sati aññam jīvam aññam sarīranti vā diṭṭhiyā sati atthā iva jāti pe
nighātam paññapemi

original: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṁ no.

original: ‘Na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.
analyzed: na hoti tathāgato param maraṇā ati mālukyaputta diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariya vāso evam pi no

original: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti …pe…

yesā aham diṭṭhā iva dhamme nighātam paññapemi

original: ‘Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṁ no.

original: ‘Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.

original: ‘Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti …pe…

yesā aham diṭṭhā iva dhamme nighātam paññapemi
